eu.socialsensor.graphbased.clust

Class LWPCommunityDetector<V,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.socialsensor.graphbased.clust.LWPCommunityDetector<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - 

    public class LWPCommunityDetector<V,E>
extends Object
    Class implementing the local community detection method by Luo, Wang and Promislow appearing in the paper "Exploring Local Community Structures in Large Networks", WI 2006.
    Author:
    papadop

      • getLWPModularity

        public LocalModularity getLWPModularity(Community<V,E> community)
        Compute the LPW modularity measure introduced by Luo, Wang and Promislow. This method has been made public so that other algorithms can use the same measure (but a different search strategy).
        Parameters:
        community - Input community.
        Returns:
